amendment.description: An amendment to require the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development to establishment and maintain on the homepage of the website of the Department of Housing and Urban Development a direct link to the website for the Office of the Inspector General of the Department of Housing and Urban Development.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2830 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2830 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator McCaskill. (consideration: CR S11404-11405; text: CR S11404) An amendment to require the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development to establishment and maintain on the homepage of the website of the Department of Housing and Urban Development a direct link to the website for the Office of the Inspector General of the Department of Housing and Urban Development.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2830 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2830 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator McCaskill.
